title: Enemy of the State
creator_credit: Tony Scott, Jerry Bruckheimer, Scott Free Productions and Touchstone Pictures
brief_description: In this action thriller from director Tony Scott, Will Smith plays Robert Clayton Dean, an innocent everyman who gets caught up in espionage, murder and government corruption. When Robert is handed a tape with damning evidence, he discovers there is no hiding from the insidious technology that tracks his every move. Robert seeks the aid of former covert operative Brill - Gene Hackman in a role that references his iconic Harry Caul from key 1970s paranoid thriller “The Conversation”. Cast also includes Jon Voight, Gabriel Byrne, Jason Robards.
